department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The acquisition of halal meat products including delivery to 3 regions: Montreal, Donnacona (Quebec) and La Macaza, as detailed in Annex A
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on February 06, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service Canada, is issuing this request for standing offers (RFSO) for the acquisition of halal meat products.../....
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Information

* **Project Title**: Acquisition of Halal Meat Products
	+ **English**: 21301-232114 Acquisition of halal meat products - RFSO
	+ **French**: 21301-232114 - Achat des produits de viande halal - DOC
* **Reference Number**: WS3800971876-Doc3808993921
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3800971876
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

#### Tender Details

* **Closing Date and Time**: Monday, 06 February 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Bid Receipt Deadline**: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before the closing date and time.
* **Bid Consequence**: Bids submitted after the closing date and time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Regions of Delivery

* **Delivery Regions**: Montreal, Donnacona (Quebec), and La Macaza

#### Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the terms and conditions of the following trade agreements:
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information**: Alina Cocieru, Besoin des services correctionnels du Canada (SCC)
	+ Email: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc
